name: First Guaranty Bancshares, Inc.
description: First Guaranty Bancshares, Inc. is a bank holding company based in the United States, primarily focused on providing a wide range of banking and financial services through its subsidiary, First Guaranty Bank. Established in 1950, First Guaranty Bancshares has built a reputation for excellence in customer service and community involvement. The company offers various services, including personal and commercial banking, mortgage lending, and wealth management. With a commitment to enhancing the financial well-being of its customers, First Guaranty Bank provides tailored solutions to meet the diverse needs of individuals and businesses alike. The bank operates multiple branches across Louisiana and Texas, ensuring accessibility for its clients. First Guaranty Bancshares also emphasizes technology-driven solutions, offering online banking and mobile banking services to enhance customer convenience. As a community-focused institution, the company actively participates in local initiatives and supports economic development in the regions it serves. The mission of First Guaranty Bancshares is to create lasting relationships with customers by delivering exceptional financial services while maintaining the highest standards of integrity and professionalism.

seo.meta_description: Explore First Guaranty Bancshares, a community-focused bank providing a range of banking and financial services with a commitment to customer service and innovation.

faq.answer: First Guaranty Bancshares is headquartered in Hammond, Louisiana, USA.

faq.answer: First Guaranty Bancshares was founded in 1950.
